results.title: Inhibition of angiotensin-induced aortic aneurysm by metformin in apolipoprotein E-deficient mice
results.text_hl: Inhibition of angiotensin-induced @<m>DISEASE_Aortic_Aneurysm</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D001014 @@@aortic aneurysm@@@ by @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@ in @GENE_APOE @GENE_11816 @@@apolipoprotein E@@@-deficient mice

results.title: Engineering a Human Pluripotent Stem Cell-Based in vitro Microphysiological System for Studying the Metformin Response in Aortic Smooth Muscle Cells
results.text_hl: In this study, we induced an in vitro microphysiological system to test @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@, which is a potential drug for the treatment of @<m>DISEASE_Aortic_Aneurysm</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D001014 @@@aortic aneurysms@@@.

citations.NLM: Chen N, Abudupataer M, Feng S, Zhu S, Ma W, Li J, Lai H, Zhu K, Wang C. Engineering a Human Pluripotent Stem Cell-Based in vitro Microphysiological System for Studying the Metformin Response in Aortic Smooth Muscle Cells Front Bioeng Biotechnol. 2021;9():627877. PMID: 33816448

results.title: Metformin and Risks of Aortic Aneurysm and Aortic Dissection: A Mendelian Randomization Study.
results.text_hl: @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@Metformin@@@ and Risks of @<m>DISEASE_Aortic_Aneurysm</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D001014 @@@Aortic Aneurysm@@@ and @DISEASE_Aortic_Dissection @DISEASE_MESH:D000784 @@@Aortic Dissection@@@: A Mendelian Randomization Study.

results.title: Current Pharmacological Management of Aortic Aneurysm.
results.text_hl: Currently, beta-adrenergic blocking agents, @CHEMICAL_Losartan @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019808 @@@losartan@@@, @CHEMICAL_Irbesartan @CHEMICAL_MESH:D000077405 @@@irbesartan@@@, angiotensin-converting-enzyme inhibitors, statins, antiplatelet agents, @CHEMICAL_Doxycycline @CHEMICAL_MESH:D004318 @@@doxycycline@@@, and @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@ have been investigated as potential candidates for preventing @<m>DISEASE_Aortic_Aneurysm</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D001014 @@@AA@@@ progression.

citations.NLM: Xiang B, Zhu S, Li J, Lai H, Wang C, Zhu K. Current Pharmacological Management of Aortic Aneurysm. J Cardiovasc Pharmacol. 2021 Aug 1;78(2):211-220. PMID: 33990514

results.title: Association of metformin use with abdominal aortic aneurysm: A systematic review and meta-analysis.
results.text_hl: The findings suggest that @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@ may be linked to a reduced risk of @<m>DISEASE_Aortic_Aneurysm</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D001014 @@@aortic aneurysm@@@.

citations.NLM: Dewangga R, Winston K, Ilhami LG, Indriani S, Siddiq T, Adiarto S. Association of metformin use with abdominal aortic aneurysm: A systematic review and meta-analysis. Asian Cardiovasc Thorac Ann. 2024 Jan 18;():2184923231225794. PMID: 38239055

results.title: The Expression Patterns and Roles of Lysyl Oxidases in Aortic Dissection
results.text_hl: Furthermore, we found that @GENE_LOXL2 @GENE_4017 @@@LOXL2@@@ and @GENE_LOXL4 @GENE_84171 @@@LOXL4@@@ was inhibited by @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@ and @CHEMICAL_Losartan @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019808 @@@losartan@@@ in HASMCs, which indicated that @GENE_LOXL2 @GENE_4017 @@@LOXL2@@@ and @GENE_LOXL4 @GENE_84171 @@@LOXL4@@@ are the potential targets that involved in the therapeutic effects of @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@ and @CHEMICAL_Losartan @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019808 @@@losartan@@@ on @<m>DISEASE_Aortic_Aneurysm</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D001014 @@@aortic or aneurysm@@@ expansion.

citations.NLM: Yi X, Zhou Y, Chen Y, Feng X, Liu C, Jiang DS, Geng J, Li X, Jiang X, Fang ZM. The Expression Patterns and Roles of Lysyl Oxidases in Aortic Dissection Front Cardiovasc Med. 2021;8():692856. PMID: 34307505

results.title: Association between use of oral-antidiabetic drugs and the risk of aortic aneurysm: a nested case-control analysis
results.text_hl: The effects of @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@ and @CHEMICAL_Sulfonylurea_Compounds @CHEMICAL_MESH:D013453 @@@sulfonylurea@@@ on @<m>DISEASE_Aortic_Aneurysm</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D001014 @@@AA@@@ were dose responsive.

results.title: Metformin inhibits monocyte-to-macrophage differentiation via AMPK-mediated inhibition of STAT3 activation: potential role in atherosclerosis.
results.text_hl: @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@Metformin@@@ attenuated @GENE_AGT @GENE_11606 @@@Ang-II@@@-induced @DISEASE_Plaque_Atherosclerotic @DISEASE_MESH:D058226 @@@atheromatous plaque formation@@@ and @<m>DISEASE_Aortic_Aneurysm</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D001014 @@@aortic aneurysm@@@ in ApoE(-/-) @SPECIES_10090 @@@mice@@@ partly by reducing monocyte infiltration.
